Name: Orange Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Exactly as it says on the tin: a classic Daiquiri with a fruity splash of freshly squeezed orange juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Orange Daiquiri contains 174 calories
